item.title: JavaScript - Dynamic Load script || JSONP Callback
item.description: JavaScript - Dynamic Load script || JSONP Callback Intro Sometimes we need dynamic load script or handle jsonp callback And we need handle script onload or jsonp callback onload or something error How to do? Use onload, onerror method Code if (typeof UTIL == 'undefined' || !UTIL) { var UTIL = {}; } UTIL.createEl = { get: function(sTag, oAttr, handleOnLoad, handleError) { var el = document.createElement(sTag); for (var i in
